title: Im palt 2, and I got a bronze 3 in my ranked soloQ?
body:
So Riot, hoping you can explain?

Is the flex pick just normals? mmr isnt affected at all?

Or are you is there some other explanation?

I feel like, getting a bronze in my team is a bit extreme, even for normals, he was utterly clueles,s his brain, couldn't even comprehend the concept of wards,

I just dont get it

replies.body: Ranked mmr reset also happened.  This happens every season and every season people complain.
you are usually getting placed lower. how did you go (w/l)

meh 5 and 5, ended silver 3, rekking every game, except, i keep getting bronze on my team and vsing diamonds,

I am at a loss for words, is this how riot balanced the w/l ratio?

> [{quoted}](name=FlammableJim,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3InUsegn,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-11-13T02:05:41.440+0000)
>
> meh 5 and 5, ended silver 3, rekking every game, except, i keep getting bronze on my team and vsing diamonds,
> 
> I am at a loss for words, is this how riot balanced the w/l ratio?

I heard there were some Bugs with Placement too Low but those were like Diamond goes Bronze 5 so idk if they applied in your case. I got placed plat 1 from dia 5 with 8/2 so it seems maybe a Bit Low but No too Far away
Also its not ranked solo, you are still plat 2 in that.
yeah, but im not having fun with a bronze on my team XD, thats the point of the game atm
